name: Suman Chatterjee
address: 131 West Plaza, Townlane , Stanwell, Staines-Upon-Thames, TW19 7FH
profile: Senior iOS Developer more than 19 years of software development experience. Skills included strong knowledge of iOS, Objective-C, Swift, C/C++, Agile development approach, Object-Oriented Analysis and Design, Object Oriented Programming, software integration and Product development.

technical_knowledge.summary: Over 7+ years of experience in iOS,Swift and native iOS applications development both for iPhone and iPad.
strong: Commercial development experience with Swift in all version.
Experience developing SSL/HTTPS secure iOS Apps using Security framework and Keychain.
TDD and Continuous Integration best practice. BDD and test automation.
JSON, REST, SOAP Web services, OAuth services etc.
Experience on various architectural pattern such as MVVM, MVVM-C, MVC, Clean Swift and Viper, Protocol oriented programming.

results.title: iOS Consultant
results.overview: Involve in the Implementation of the brand-new version of Sainsbury’s SmartShop app. Providing the Architectural support for the iOS app.
responsibility: Prototyping and architecting new Sainsbury’s easy payments app with Swift 4.x where integrating the Apple pay and card payment service.
Implementing Barcode/QR-Code scanning and product Rescan feature.
Pair programming, follow Extreme Programming best practice.
Architectural pattern such as MVVM, MVVM-C, MVC, Protocol oriented programming.
